mapper.select: SELECT signals.signalsID, signals.switchID, signals.time, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'dl', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS dl, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'dqywgdl', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS dqywgdl, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'dqyygdl', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS dqyygdl, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'dy', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS dy, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'glys', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS glys, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'pl', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS pl, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'wd', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS wd, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'wgdl', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS wgdl, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'wggl', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS wggl, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'ygdl', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS ygdl, GROUP_CONCAT(IF(signals.signalsTypeID = 'yggl', signals.`value`, NULL)) AS yggl FROM signals WHERE signals.switchID = #{switchID} AND signals.time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY signals.time
